articles.Title: How enterprises can use artificial intelligence
articles.Description: Enterprise IT shops are finding that artificial intelligence isn't just for robotics anymore.  Science fiction may portray A.I. technologies as the brains running robots trying to take over the human race,  but the technology today is being used for far more benign purposes.
